name: The Mix-Up
description:
You play as the soul of a talented professor. A mishap happened to you during the last test of your earth-shattering invention. Try to get everything back to normal.

Use your invention - a special tool with many uses.
Everything you need is in this room, good luck ;)

Primarily developed for the Oculus Quest, but also available for Oculus Rift/-S (via Zip-File)
All content (except of the sound) was created exclusively for the VR Jam 2020. Created by: Manuel Peris, Alina Wingert and Lisa Lauer from Kaiserslautern, Germany.
